hero.heading: Safety & Security
hero.copy: From multi-point hardware to fire-resistance, you don’t ever have to second guess your entry door’s security.
hero.direction: Things to consider while you shop

inspiration.heading: Fire-rated doors
copy: A door and its frame together create a fire-rated system. Steel can be fire-rated as high as 90 minutes, while fiberglass is usually rated for 20 minutes.

inspiration.heading: Multi-point locking systems
copy: In addition to standard deadbolts and foot bolts, you can have a multi-point lock system installed. Its three secure locking points of engagement on the door provide added security—and peace of mind. Deadbolts and foot bolts are also great lock options.
